newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey says it killed 27 Kurd guerrillas.
newsitem.headline: Turkey says it killed 27 Kurd guerrillas.

text.p: Turkish troops killed 27 rebel Kurds in clashes in eastern Turkey, a military official said on Thursday.
The clashes took place in Bingol province over the last 24 hours, the official said. He gave no military casualties.
More than 21,000 people have been killed in the 12-year conflict between the military and Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) guerrillas fighting for self rule in the southeast of the country.
